description: Sardines.js is a Free-to-Decompose distributed system and application framework in Typescript, and runnable in both the server and browser
name: sardines-core

scripts.buildProd: npm run clearProd && tsc --build conf/tsconfig.prod.json && npm run makeExecProd
scripts.prod: npm run compileRepo && npm run reverseCompile && npm run buildProd  && node lib/prod/index.js
scripts.buildDev: npm run clearDev && tsc --build conf/tsconfig.dev.json && npm run makeExecDev
scripts.dev: npm run compileRepo && npm run reverseCompile && npm run buildDev && node lib/dev/index.js
scripts.makeExecProd: file=lib/prod/index.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chmod a+x $file
scripts.makeExecDev: file=lib/dev/index.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chomd a+x $file
